stimulusHtml: Which of the following code segments assigns the same value to  sum  as the preceding code segment?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment.

 

int j = 0;
int sum = 0;

while (j <= 5)
{
   j++;
   sum += j;
}

choicesHtml:
int sum = 0;
for (int j = 0; j <= 5; j++)
{
   j++;
   sum += j;
}

int sum = 0;
for (int j = 0; j <= 6; j++)
{
   j++;
   sum += j;
}

int sum = 0;
for (int j = 1; j <= 5; j++)
{
   sum += j;
}

int sum = 0;
for (int j = 1; j <= 6; j++)
{
   sum += j;
}
